profile.en:
A member of the Vigilante Crew who tends to show up suddenly and unannounced.

Reisa is rambunctious and loud, so much so that she's often taken for a joke. But there's no one more passionate about Vigilante Crew activities than she is. She likes to make an entrance when she bursts on to the scene, and is always testing out different heroic introductions.
profile.jp:
トリニティのあちこちに出没し、治安の維持活動をしているトリニティ総合学園所属、自警団のメンバー。

掴みどころのない事を言うため、いたずら通報だと思われる時もあるが、誰よりも真剣に自警団活動をしているのだとか。名乗りあげる口上が、毎回少しずつ変わる模様。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
三一综合学园所属，在三一到处出没维持治安的「三一自警团」成员。

有时会因为净说些说不到点上的事而被当作恶意通报，但实际上比任何人都更认真地进行自警团的活动。
每次讲报上名号的开场白时似乎都有些不同。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
出没在三一的各个角落，进行着治安维持活动的三一综合学园所属，自卫队的成员。

由于会说一些难以捉摸的话，有时会被误会是恶作剧通报，但其实比任何人都认真进行着自卫队的活动。自我介绍时报上的名号似乎每次都会逐渐改变。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
三一综合学园所属，在三一到处出没维持治安的「三一自警团」成员。

有时会因为净说些说不到点上的事而被当作恶意通报，但实际上比任何人都更认真地进行自警团的活动。
每次讲报上名号的开场白时似乎都有些不同。

gacha.en: The ace, hero, arbitrator, knight, and star. I am...Uzawa Reisa!
gacha.jp:
正義を求める人の元に……私あり……そう私こそがスーパースター。
宇沢レイサ、見参です！
gacha.zh_cn_jp:
在追求正义之人的内心中……有我在……对，我即是超级巨星。
宇泽玲纱，前来谒见！
gacha.zh_cn_tw:
追寻正义之人的身边……有我在……没错，我就是超级巨星。
宇沢澪纱，在此登场！
gacha.zh_cn_cn:
在追求正义之人的内心中……有我在……对，我即是超级巨星。
宇泽玲纱，前来谒见！

intro.en: Hi, hello! Everyone's superstar savior, Uzawa Reisa, is here!

みんなのスーパースター、宇沢レイサ、登場です！

大家的超级巨星，宇沢澪纱登场！

hobby.jp: 読書、人間観察

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: Sensei meets with Kazusa at her request. She explains she is being stalked, but seems reluctant to report the incidents to the Justice Task Force. As Sensei is asking her for more details, the stalker herself appears and attacks Kazusa.

name.en: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.jp: After-School Sweets Story: Sweet Secrets and Shootouts
name.zh_cn: 放学后的甜点故事～甜秘密和枪击战～

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

desc.en: The stalker ends up being Kazusa's old schoolmate, Uzawa Reisa of the Vigilante Crew. Sensei and Kazusa manage to lose Reisa surprisingly easily. After Sensei presses her a little further, Kazusa reluctantly shows Sensei a picture of her middle school days, revealing her past as a thug.
desc.jp: The stalker ends up being Kazusa's old schoolmate, Uzawa Reisa of the Vigilante Crew. Sensei and Kazusa manage to lose Reisa surprisingly easily. After Sensei presses her a little further, Kazusa reluctantly shows Sensei a picture of her middle school days, revealing her past as a thug.
desc.zh_cn: 跟踪狂的真面目就是自卫队的宇沢{cf澪纱}。{cf千纱}在甩开{cf澪纱}后，向老师传了一张照片，并表示自己国中时曾是个太妹。

desc.en: The After-School Sweets Club learns that Kazusa was a thug, they change the name of the club to the After-School Sweets Gang and appear in front of Kazusa wearing thug-like costumes. After seeing this, Reisa starts a fight with the After-School Sweets Gang, claiming that Cath Palug is trying to revive by forming a new organization.
desc.jp: The After-School Sweets Club learns that Kazusa was a thug, they change the name of the club to the After-School Sweets Gang and appear in front of Kazusa wearing thug-like costumes. After seeing this, Reisa starts a fight with the After-School Sweets Gang, claiming that Cath Palug is trying to revive by forming a new organization.
desc.zh_cn: {cn放学后的甜点部}的所有人得知了{cf千纱}曾经是太妹的事实。将名称改成「放学后的甜点团」后装成太妹（？）的样子出现在{cf千纱}的面前。看见这模样的{cf澪纱}说「凯茜．帕鲁格」想策划并复活新的组织，并和放学后的甜点团展开激烈的战斗。

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？
